title: Emery Smith — Insider
body: Emery Smith, the insider formerly known as “Paul”, comes forward to reveal his work inside secret biological facilities deep under the New Mexico desert. He tells us of his induction into secret military testing facilities where he was tasked with dissecting extraterrestrial tissue samples.
teaser: Emery Smith, the insider formerly known as “Paul”, comes forward to reveal his work inside secret biological facilities deep under the New Mexico desert. He tells us of his induction into secret military testing facilities where he was tasked with dissecting extraterrestrial tissue samples.

title: Technologies of the Secret Base
body: Our continuing talks with Emery Smith take us deeper into the secret underground facilities in New Mexico where he was tasked with dissecting tissue from strange bodies. As we get deeper into his story, details emerge concerning the facility, the technology he used, and security procedures.
teaser: Our continuing talks with Emery Smith take us deeper into the secret underground facilities in New Mexico where he was tasked with dissecting tissue from strange bodies. As we get deeper into his story, details emerge concerning the facility, the technology he used, and security procedures.

title: Clones and Programmable Life Forms
body: Reporting to work in a secret underground facility is not a commonplace task, as relayed by Emery Smith, who relays his experiences handling exobiological specimens, ranging from small tissue samples to full-size beings. These startling revelations are just the beginning of the strangest details to emerge.
teaser: Reporting to work in a secret underground facility is not a commonplace task, as relayed by Emery Smith, who relays his experiences handling exobiological specimens, ranging from small tissue samples to full-size beings. These startling revelations are just the beginning of the strangest details to emerge.

title: Staged Alien Abductions
body: Emery Smith gives us a new perspective on what is really happening during various abduction scenarios. The public is the subject of mass mind-control operations instilling fear and confusion through every means possible, including the media and staged alien abductions.
teaser: Emery Smith gives us a new perspective on what is really happening during various abduction scenarios. The public is the subject of mass mind-control operations instilling fear and confusion through every means possible, including the media and staged alien abductions.

title: Hybrid Creatures and Secret Bases
body: Emery Smith brings forward his information concerning the formation of underground bases and secret programs creating strange hybrid creatures. During his time analyzing tissue samples, he has come across beings that can only be described as the unnatural genetic pairing of two distinct species.
teaser: Emery Smith brings forward his information concerning the formation of underground bases and secret programs creating strange hybrid creatures.

title: Secrets at the South Pole
body: With every passing day, Antarctica is garnering more attention from mainstream and alternative news sources, alike. Emery Smith urges, that as the ice melts, the secrets at the south pole will no longer be contained.
teaser: With every passing day, Antarctica is garnering more attention from mainstream and alternative news sources, alike.

title: Nazca Tunnels and Super-Suit Technology
body: Emery Smith fills in the gaps of disclosures brought by other insiders concerning vast subterranean tunnels and complexes in South America underlying the Nazca lines. We also learn intricate details of a smart suit developed for the secret super soldier program.
teaser: Emery Smith fills in the gaps of disclosures brought by other insiders concerning vast subterranean tunnels and complexes in South America underlying the Nazca lines.

title: The Dangers of Being an SSP Insider
body: Emery Smith confirms testimonies from other insiders who were once a part of the secret space program. He also highlights the dangers he faces in coming forward to reveal what they do not want you to know.
teaser: Emery Smith confirms testimonies from other insiders who were once a part of the secret space program.

title: David Adair Bio
body:
David Adair explains how he became the original rocket man. From his early childhood experiences of intently reading everything he could on science to launching his first rockets in a cornfield in Ohio. The future of space travel has long been an obsession of his, fueling his search for sustainable energy for the whole planet. He’s had an incredible career as a rocket scientist and space technology transfer consultant, from meeting Arthur Rudolph and Stephen Hawking to encountering a UFO’s alien engine in action at the infamous Area 51 in Nevada. Meet one of the most outstanding minds in the field of spaceflight.

Subtitles available in English, Deutsch, Português, 中文, Русский, and Español.
teaser: David Adair explains how he became the original rocket man.

title: The Original Rocket Man with David Adair
body:
David Wilcock introduces us to David Adair, an insider from the original Disclosure Project lineup who has worked for most of his life developing secret rocket technology. He was an exceptional child who developed a strong interest in the future of space travel after devouring countless books in his local library. As he started launching rockets in a cornfield in Ohio, the military took an interest in his unusual hobby. Once they realized that his technology was far in advance of theirs, he was brought in to Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, and eventually to descend into the depths of Area 51.

Subtitles available in English, Deutsch, Português, 中文, Русский, and Español.
teaser: David Adair, an insider from the original Disclosure Project lineup who has worked for most of his life developing secret rocket technology. As he started launching rockets in a corn field in Ohio, the military took an interest in his unusual hobby and brought him in.

title: The Descent into Area 51 with David Adair
body:
David Adair continues the discourse of his descent into Area 51 with David Wilcock, as he discusses his initial examination of an alien fusion reactor. Feeling undaunted by the ominous nature of area 51’s construction he gleefully scaled the exterior of a strange edifice that would turn out to be an electromagnetic fusion-containment reactor, built on another world. What would ultimately rattle his composure would be the realization of the military’s interest in his rocketry expertise, and the lengths they would go to ensure his compliance with their intentions. 

Subtitles available in English, Deutsch, Português, 中文, Русский, and Español.
teaser: David Adair continues the discourse of his descent into Area 51 with David Wilcock, as he discusses his initial examination of an alien fusion reactor.

title: Alien Tech at the Vatican
body: A strange craft, unlike anything ever seen, was shot down and the wreckage sent to a secret storage facility in New Mexico. As part of an investigative team, Emery Smith was sent to scour the Vatican archives for any information concerning similar technology. He offers us details of his descent into a trove of information, forbidden to many people on the planet. Though the collection of crashed craft may sound like an outstanding occurrence to us, for the secret military programs this is an everyday incident. Thus, the clandestine accumulation of exotic technology and alien bodies is far greater than we could have imagined.
teaser: As part of an investigative team, Emery Smith was sent to scour the Vatican archives for any information on a strange craft, unlike anything ever seen, that was shot down. We learn that the clandestine accumulation of exotic technology and alien bodies is far greater than we could have imagined.

title: Bioship
body: Imagine a being that shares consciousness and DNA with the craft it uses to traverse the cosmos. Emery Smith recalls a time when he encountered a being who had more in common with its craft than a place of origin. While taking samples from a red-colored alien being, he was called away on a special run to examine a craft which had a strong similarity to the being he just left on the examination table. He tells of his experience within this craft, how it was built, and the unique bond it holds with its operator.
teaser: Imagine a being that shares consciousness and DNA with the craft it uses to traverse the cosmos. Emery Smith recalls a time when he encountered a being who had more in common with its craft than a place of origin.

title: Confirming Underground Civilizations
body: Emery Smith discusses details of his own subterranean expedition, and subsequent discussions with other insiders, which confirm the existence of civilizations thriving in underground caverns. Despite the attempts to cover up the existence of these communities, advances in civilian technology are revealing these subterranean locations with incredible resolution.
teaser: Emery Smith discusses details of his own subterranean expedition, and subsequent discussions with other insiders, which confirm the existence of civilizations thriving in underground caverns.

title: Subterranean Secrets of Humanity
body: As important details emerge of humanity’s clandestine exploits into space, Emery Smith explains that the deepest secrets concerning life in the universe remain buried below our feet. Deep within these caverns, the secrets to unlocking our human lineage and our place in the cosmos has long been hidden. Revealing these secrets will finally lift the limitations that have long been imposed upon human civilization.
teaser: Deep within hidden caverns, the secrets to unlocking our human lineage and our place in the cosmos has long been hidden. Revealing these secrets will finally lift the limitations that have long been imposed upon human civilization.

title: Programming Human-Alien Hybrids
body: After examining more than 3,000 specimens in a secret facility, Emery Smith has keen understanding of the genetic diversity of intelligent beings found throughout the cosmos and on our planet. He explains the complexities of creating human-alien hybrids. Some of which are used as programmed lifeforms, created for specific uses.
teaser: Emery Smith explains the complexities of creating human-alien hybrids. Some of which are used as programmed lifeforms, created for specific uses.

title: Extreme Experiments with Alien Hybrids
body: Emery Smith plays out a worst-case scenario, based on the human-alien hybrid programs, that are frighteningly similar to the Resident Evil movies. From A.I. controlled bases to super soldiers, zombies and bizarre creatures, all is not well in some underground testing facilities. Strangely enough, all of this ties in with humanity’s extraterrestrial lineage and where we are headed as a species.
teaser: Emery Smith plays out a worst-case scenario, based on the human-alien hybrid programs, that are frighteningly similar to the Resident Evil movies. Strangely enough, all of this ties in with humanity’s extraterrestrial lineage and where we are headed as a species.

title: Initiation into Secret Projects
body: What does it take to be accepted into secret programs where one works with extraterrestrials and advanced technology? Emery Smith fills us in with details of his early military career when he was given the opportunity to undertake additional trainings and responsibilities that led to his work deep underground. He gives us insights into his extensive training in medical technology and techniques, most of which is still not available in civilian sectors.
teaser: What does it take to be accepted into secret programs where one works with extraterrestrials and advanced technology? Emery Smith fills us in with details of his early military career when he was given the opportunity to undertake additional trainings and responsibilities that led to his work deep underground.

title: Dire Consequences of Breaching Security
body: During his tenure underground, Emery Smith progressed through many degrees of clearance to be tasked with examining the interior of alien crafts. We know that security is of paramount concern when working with technology from other worlds, and he reveals the surprising power shifts and dire consequences that came from the one time he was caught in a restricted area.
teaser: During his tenure underground, Emery Smith progressed through many degrees of clearance to be tasked with examining the interior of alien crafts. He reveals the surprising power shifts and dire consequences that came from the one time he was caught in a restricted area.

title: E.T. Coworkers
body: Though underground bases may be manned and controlled by human beings, not every occupant is from Earth. Emery Smith relays accounts of the times when he worked, side by side, with people of un-Earth origin. From apelike beings to reptilians and insectoids, the most astounding aspects are not our differences, but the many similarities we all share.
teaser: Emery Smith relays accounts of the times when he worked, side by side, with people of un-Earth origin. From apelike beings to reptilians and insectoids, the most astounding aspects are not our differences, but the many similarities we all share.

title: Reptilians and Aquifarians
body: Emery Smith offers more insights into the extraterrestrial beings that he worked with, deep in the underground bases. He explains that some of these beings were not only from different parts of this universe, but from other universes, as well. What comes to light are the benevolent reptilians known to ancient Native American peoples, and the aquatic beings which can be found in the folklore of many cultures. He claims that these are beings still engaged within secret projects in these underground bases.
teaser: Emery Smith offers more insights into the extraterrestrial beings that he worked with, deep in the underground bases. What comes to light are the benevolent reptilians aquatic beings, both known to ancient folklore.

title: Bigfoot and Tall Whites
body: As Emery Smith’s security clearance was raised, he was allowed to go the deeper into the underground base, enabling him to work with a wider range of un-Earth beings. This included various tall whites, Nordics, avians, reptilians and bigfoot-type beings. He gives us intricate details of these creatures, including how they dressed, communicated, moved and smelled.
teaser: As Emery Smith’s security clearance was raised, he was allowed to go the deeper into the underground base, enabling him to work with a wider range of un-Earth beings. Including tall whites, Nordics, avians, reptilians and bigfoot-type beings.

title: A Day in the Life Underground
body: Entering an underground facility may be an ordeal, but these places have every accommodation and amenity that may be needed for an extended stay, for human and extraterrestrial, alike. Emery Smith guides us through a day in the life of working in a secret underground base and what happens when he is required to stay the night. From the examination rooms to living quarters and cafeteria conditions, life underground may not be so bad, after all.
teaser: Entering an underground facility may be an ordeal, but these places have every accommodation and amenity that may be needed for an extended stay, for human and extraterrestrial, alike. From the examination rooms to living quarters and cafeteria conditions, life underground may not be so bad, after all.

title: Rise of the Moss-Man
body: After five and a half years of examining tissue samples, the work began to take a toll on Emery Smith and his time to resign from these projects finally came. But it would not be easy to leave. He explains the ordeal he endured as he began his withdrawal from the secret testing facility. Over the years, he has been recalled to work on various projects for different reasons. Most startling among them was the work he did with a being that can be best described as a moss-man.
teaser: After five and a half years of examining tissue samples, the work began to take a toll on Emery Smith and his time to resign from these projects finally came. But it would not be easy to leave. Over the years, he has been recalled to work on various projects for different reasons.

title: Time Travel & Shifting Realities
body: Are we seeing the effects of time travelers changing the past? Emery Smith reveals that time travel technology is far older that we may have thought. During his time within the compartmentalized projects, he was introduced to the technology which could propel one forward or backward in time, to specific events. He discloses the nature of this technology, how it works and the nature of time-travel missions. We also learn that humanity is evolving the ability to detect changes to our timelines and shifts in the reality we think we live in.
teaser: Emery Smith introduces us to the technology which could propel one forward or backward in time, to specific events. Also, that humanity is evolving the ability to detect changes to our timelines and shifts in the reality we think we live in.

title: Disinformation Tactics
body: Emery Smith discloses various disinformation tactics used to deceive the public, mislead UFO investigations and retain secrets within clandestine programs. From falsified documents, artificial beings, replicated spacecraft and fabricated viral videos, a web of deception has been spread across the world. The moment he set foot in the underground facility, he was told that he would occasionally be exposed to fabricated materials. The longer he remained within these programs, the more he learned the extent that these organizations will go to mislead everyone involved.
teaser: Emery Smith discloses various disinformation tactics used to deceive the public, mislead UFO investigations and retain secrets within clandestine programs. In these programs he learned the extent that organizations will go to mislead everyone involved.

title: Interdimensional Light Beings
body: Since the dawn of humanity beings born of light have been manifesting in physical forms on Earth. Why are they here and what are they doing with our people and planet? Emery Smith unveils the qualities of interdimensional beings, which can appear as orbs, angels or aliens. They are not encumbered by the physical laws of our reality and reveal themselves, at their own great risk. Yet, their ongoing presence is of great importance to both of our species.
teaser: Since the dawn of humanity beings of light manifest in physical forms on Earth. Why are they here and what are they doing with our people and planet? Emery Smith unveils the qualities of interdimensional beings, which can appear as orbs, angels or aliens.

title: Medical Devices of the Future
body: The next medical revolution just may be coming to your smart devices, and sooner than you think. Insider Emery Smith describes some of the advances in medical technology, he was exposed to, that will soon be made available to the public. Some of which was in use within the secret projects, others have been developed by scientists who have an advanced understanding of healing the body. Currently, steps are being taken to bring this tech forward in such a way that we will be ready for it and the lives of its inventors will not be threatened.
teaser: The next medical revolution just may be coming to your smart devices, and sooner than you think. Insider Emery Smith describes some of the advances in medical technology, he was exposed to, that will soon be made available to the public.

title: Salvaging Ancient Alien Tech
body: From recently discarded tech to ancient E.T. craft, our solar system is awash with space junk and major aerospace corporations vie for their share of the spoils. Emery Smith gives us the inside scoop on who is running interplanetary salvaging programs and what they gain from the strange things that they find. He explains that most of the technologies in the SSPs, from spacesuits to vehicles, have been reverse-engineered from alien wreckage salvaged from deep-space missions.
teaser: Our solar system is awash with space junk and major corporations vie for their share of the spoils. Emery Smith gives us the inside scoop on who is running interplanetary salvaging programs and what they gain from the strange things that they find.

title: Recovering Crashed Alien Crafts
body: What happens when an alien craft crashes? Emery Smith learned this, first hand, while stationed in the secret base in Northern New Mexico. Occasionally, he would be deployed as part of a team to assess and retrieve crashed alien vessels. Even though extraterrestrial technology is far in advance of our own, it is not without its flaws and tragic accidents do happen. He explains why he was sent on these missions, the technology and beings recovered, as well as the protocols used to secure and quarantine crash sites.
teaser: What happens when an alien craft crashes?  Emery Smith learned this, first hand, while stationed in the secret base in Northern New Mexico. Occasionally, he would be deployed as part of a team to assess and retrieve crashed alien vessels.

title: Portals: Connecting the Cosmic Highway
body: Emery Smith discloses his experience with one of the most important projects in the compartmentalized programs: the discovery and securing of portals to distant worlds. He explains that some are naturally formed and were known to ancient cultures who built temples around them. Many others are manmade, using technology that has not been perfected. The interconnection of these portal systems has become a cosmic highway for many extraterrestrial civilizations, who use portals on Earth as a hub to travel to far away star systems.
teaser: One of the most important projects in the compartmentalized programs is the discovery of portals to distant worlds. The interconnection of these portal systems has become a cosmic highway for many extraterrestrial civilizations.

title: The Perils of Portal Missions
body: During his time within the secret programs, Emery Smith was sent on missions to distant worlds, through interplanetary portals. Despite months of planning and training with a qualified team, things do not always go as expected and accidents happen. He explains what the training is like, the steps taken to ensure the safety of the team, and some of the anomalous conditions he encountered during these off-planet missions.
teaser: During his time within the secret programs, Emery Smith was sent on missions to distant worlds, through interplanetary portals. Despite months of planning and training with a qualified team, things do not always go as expected and accidents happen.

title: Underwater Operations
body: One of Emery Smith’s most unusual missions took him to a base located deep under the Atlantic Ocean to examine a being that could not be brought to the surface. He shares what he knows on the prevalence of bases located deep under the oceans, some of which are buried deep below the sea bed. Many of these are located near sacred sites which serve as portals to distant worlds; others were constructed to track extraterrestrial traffic moving through the Earth’s oceans.
teaser: Emery Smith shares what he knows of bases located deep under the oceans. Many of these are near sacred sites which serve as portals to distant worlds; others track extraterrestrial traffic moving through the Earth’s oceans.

title: Hidden E.T. Civilizations
body: Our planet is crawling with hidden extraterrestrial civilizations that have been here for a very long time. Some were founded before the first human civilization arose. Emery Smith reveals that there are many different biospheres perfectly acclimatized to support life from distant worlds, scattered all around our planet. From Antarctic bases deep under the ice to aquatic being living in the depths of the sea, most are human and human-looking, some are shape shifting, to blend in with our society.
teaser: Our planet is crawling with hidden extraterrestrial civilizations that have been here for a very long time. Emery Smith reveals that there are many different biospheres perfectly acclimatized to support life from distant worlds, scattered all around our planet.

title: Clones Among Us
body: How would you know if the person you just met or someone you knew for a long time is a clone? Emery Smith discusses his exposure to different cloning and 3D printing technologies that are used to create everything from organs and entire bodies. This is becoming prevalent in many clandestine corporate projects, secret government agencies, and extraterrestrial civilizations on Earth. Each of these groups have their own agenda for using this technology, some beneficial for humanity, others with nefarious intent.
teaser: How would you know if the person you just met or someone you knew for a long time is a clone? Emery Smith discusses his exposure to different cloning and 3D printing technologies that are used to create everything from organs and entire bodies

title: Jason Rice — A New Insider
body: Jason Rice boldly comes forward as a new insider to reveal his incredible experiences within the secret space program. For the first time ever, he divulges events from his childhood that led to his induction into a recruiting arm of the MILAB programs, where he was identified as an intuitive-empath. The training he received was merely preparation for the true ordeal to come, serving in a 20 & Back program which took him to distant worlds.
teaser: For the first time ever, a new insider, Jason Rice divulges events from his childhood that led to his induction into a recruiting arm of the MILAB programs, where he was identified as an intuitive-empath.

title: A New Insider Is Put to the Test
body: For the first time on camera, an SSP insider, Jason Rice, is put to the test as he is hypnotically regressed by Georgina Cannon and given a polygraph examination concerning his service with a secret space program and extraterrestrial contact. He shares details of his introduction to these clandestine operations, including a tour of an underground base and an encounter with an extraterrestrial being. One small step into an elevator would become a giant leap into the depths of a top-secret space program.
teaser: For the first time on camera, an SSP insider, Jason Rice, is put to the test as he is hypnotically regressed by Georgina Cannon and given a polygraph examination concerning his service with a secret space program and extraterrestrial contact.

title: History of the Secret Space Program
body: During his 20 & Back tour, Jason Rice was privy to the origin and development of the secret space program into which he was recruited. From Antarctica to Mars and beyond, agreements made with extraterrestrial civilizations for advanced technology enabled the Germans to create a breakaway civilization. He gives us an insider’s view of Operations Highjump, Paperclip & Deep Freeze, and reveals the continuing conflict between the Mars-Germans and the Cabal. As contracts with the Draco near completion, what lies ahead for humanity in a post-disclosure world?
teaser: During his 20 & Back tour, Jason Rice was privy to the origin and development of the secret space program. He gives us an insider’s view of Operations Highjump, Paperclip & Deep Freeze, and the conflict between the Mars-Germans and the Cabal.

title: Reaction to the German Breakaway Civilization
body: Jason Rice discusses the events that triggered the formation of IDARF and Solar Warden. The looming threat of the Mars-German breakaway civilization sent a wave of urgency through secret government agencies on Earth. Thus, a massive clandestine buildup of advanced technology began, giving terrestrial-based governments a leg up in the secret space race. In order to secure such encroachments into the cosmos, new deals were made with the Mars-Germans and the Draco.
teaser: Jason Rice discusses the events which triggered the formation of IDARF and Solar Warden. A massive clandestine buildup of advanced technology began, giving terrestrial-based governments a leg up in the secret space race.

title: Battle for Planetary Dominance
body: Imagine the nightmare scenario of a civilization intentionally struck by a massive meteor then invaded by werewolf-like creatures. This was the situation Jason Rice faced after he completed his two-years of training and was deployed to a distant world. He was told that it was a humanitarian mission, to protect the peaceful populace from a hostile invading force. After four years of conflict, he learned that both sides were being manipulated by the Draco, who had long-term plans for this planet.
teaser: Imagine the scenario of a civilization intentionally struck by a massive meteor then invaded by werewolf-like creatures. This was the situation Jason Rice faced after he completed his two-years of training and was deployed to a distant world.

title: Advanced Weapons and Combat Technology
body: As Jason Rice’s accounts of his tour of duty with the SSP continues, he describes the level of technological sophistication of his battle dress uniform and weaponry. He elaborates upon the technical details of the suits he wore into combat and the various weapons he carried. The capabilities of these are far in advance of current military issue, with the exception of certain special access programs.
teaser: As Jason Rice’s accounts of his tour of duty with the SSP continues, he describes the level of technological sophistication of his battle dress uniform and weaponry.

title: The Ultimate Battle Continues
body: The battle rages on for Jason Rice, as invading forces seem poised to overrun the meager defenses of this once peaceful planet. Jason continues his accounts of combat on a planet the Draco sought to control by using a proxy combat force made up of werewolf-like beings. He describes the weapons and tactics used to eventually defeated the invading forces. Behind the scenes, the Draco and the Cabal worked together to bring about an unexpected outcome to the conflict.
teaser: Invading forces seem poised to overrun the meager defenses of this once peaceful planet. Jason continues his accounts of combat on a planet the Draco sought to control by using a proxy combat force made up of werewolf-like beings.

title: E.T. Guidance of Human Ascension
body: Jason Rice reveals what he learned about the stakes being waged upon the ultimate goal of human ascension. Life in our universe follows a distinct path of evolution and ascension. Some species stumble along this path, usually taking other civilizations along with them. Others follow a less encumbered road and become instrumental as they offer subtle guidance for civilizations ready for such growth. Humanity appears to be caught in such a conflict as a war rages for the evolution of the human soul.
teaser: Jason Rice reveals what he learned about the stakes being waged upon the ultimate goal of human ascension.

title: Pathogens and Space Viruses
body: Emery Smith relays his experience with bacteria and viruses originating off world. He explains that life thrives throughout the cosmos, even in the microscopic realms. Despite the implication of threats in science fiction media, he explains that the greatest danger concerning these pathogens is not extraterrestrial, but human-based organizations actively collecting these microorganism for their own research and development.
teaser: Emery Smith relays his experience with bacteria and viruses originating off world. He explains that life thrives throughout the cosmos, even in the microscopic realms.

title: Induction into the SSP
body: The startling revelations from Jason Rice continue as he offers details of his own 20 & Back experience and Georgina Cannon continues to help him recover memories of his early days in a secret space program. He takes us back to his first day, when he found out that the induction into these clandestine operations is an ordeal, unto itself. As part of the process, he was injected with nanites, highly-programmable microscopic machines, which would become an integral asset to his duties. Perhaps the most startling revelation comes when he finds out who is really running this operation.
teaser: Jason Rice takes us back to his first day in the SSP, when he found out that the induction into these clandestine operations is an ordeal, unto itself. He was injected with nanites which would become an integral asset to his duties.

title: Invasion of a New World
body: After the fighting quelled on Planet One and cleanup underway, Jason Rice is given a new assignment. He is deployed to a new world which is also facing imminent invasion from an alien species. Nearly five years pass after the invasion and the battle is nearly lost. What will it take to turn the tide in this war, or will the invading forces finally conquer this world? And what will the true cost be, to these people?
teaser: After the fighting quelled on Planet One and cleanup underway, Jason Rice is given a new assignment. He is deployed to a new world which is also facing imminent invasion from an alien species.

title: Jason's Fiercest Battle
body: Jason Rice is soon whisked away to a new planet; one unlike anything he has ever seen before. Three indigenous species must learn to put aside their conflicts with each other to deal with the fiercest invading force that Jason has ever encountered. After almost six years of endless combat, he is gravely wounded, and medevacked to Mars. What is to come of the remainder of his time with the 20 & back program?
teaser: Jason Rice is soon whisked away to a new planet; one unlike anything he has ever seen before. Three indigenous species must learn to put aside their conflicts with each other to deal with the fiercest invaders he has ever encountered.

title: The Long Journey Home
body: After being gravely wounded on Planet Three, and taken to Mars for healing, Jason Rice returns to Planet Two, to see the full effects of the Draco’s plan of planetary domination. Once this final interplanetary mission is completed, he is returned to the Sol system to serve what may be his remaining days as a combat trainer for new recruits. Finally, his service is completed, and he is age-regression and prepared to returned home as a 24-year old with no memories of his past 20 years. This long journey home is a process which leaves him mysteriously suffering from PTSD and depression.
teaser: Once his interplanetary missions are completed, Jason Rice is returned to the Sol system to serve what may be his remaining days in the SSP. This long journey home is a process which leaves him mysteriously suffering from PTSD and depression.

title: Realizing the Great Deception
body: Looking back at his time in the secret space program, Jason Rice realized that from day one in Cape Canaveral he was lied to and great deceptions followed him throughout his career. He gives us deeper insight to the intricate machinations of the Draco and the Cabal, which give us the illusion of free will yet sinks us deeper into their machines of control. He explains that their interest in humanity stems from our uniqueness in the universe. This means that many other E.T. civilizations also have an active interest in our evolution, enacting plans which may be in direct opposition to the Draco’s long history of planetary manipulation.
teaser: Looking back at his time in the secret space program, Jason Rice realized that from day one in Cape Canaveral he was lied to and great deceptions followed him throughout his career.

title: E.T.s Helping Humanity
body: Throughout every industry and within high level government positions, extraterrestrials have infiltrated every stratum of our society. Emery Smith explains that this is actually not a bad thing as many are here to help humanity. He shares with us what he learned working alongside many different extraterrestrial beings within the compartmentalized programs. He explains that many of them look exactly like us, with only small differences, and that we have very little to fear from many of these otherworldly visitors.
teaser: Throughout every industry and within high level government positions, extraterrestrials have infiltrated every stratum of our society. Emery Smith explains that this is actually not a bad thing as many are here to help humanity.

title: Technologies of the SSP
body: Jason Rice helps to give us a better understanding of the technologies and weapons he used during his combat deployments. From the simplest to the strangest, we cannot begin to image just how advanced the technology is within the secret space programs. He explains the different types of shuttlecrafts and drones used, as each mission required a craft ideally suited for the mission parameters. Even the suits they wore into combat and the computers which guided them, gave troopers superhuman capabilities.
teaser: Jason Rice helps to give us a better understanding of the technologies and weapons he used during his combat deployments. From the simplest to the strangest, we cannot begin to image just how advanced the technology is within the secret space programs.

title: IDARF Tech
body: During his time with IDARF, Jason Rice had access to advanced technology such as medical technology which included nanite enhancement therapy and cloning to replace lost limbs. He also details some of the tech used in vehicles, like neural interfaces for pilots, antimatter power systems and forcefield protection. Some of this technology is trickling its way into mainstream use.
teaser: During his time with IDARF, Jason Rice had access to nanite enhancement therapy, cloning technology to replace lost limbs, as well as vehicles that utilize neural interfaces for pilots, antimatter power systems, and forcefield protection.

title: Culture and Customs of a Distant World
body: Jason Rice describes the culture and customs of the people a distant worlds he calls Planet 1, including how their society functioned, the guild system of education and their entertainment. What was once an idealistic world, changed as the invasion came and war raged on. He shares what he feels is important for us to learn from this civilization and the circumstances which caused their massive changes.
teaser: Jason Rice describes the culture, educational guild system, entertainment, and customs of a distant world he calls Planet 1. Including how their once idealistic world underwent massive changes due to an invasion and ongoing war.

title: Spiritual Beliefs on Distant Worlds
body: Throughout the cosmos, sentient beings seem to innately seek a spiritual connection with something that is greater than themselves, unless an external influence deviates them from this path. Jason Rice recounts some of the different spiritual traditions he encountered on planets 1, 2 and 3. Some of these groups believed in multiple gods, some believed in only one. All of them sought to work harmoniously with their environment. He relays that the invasions changed these peoples from a higher vibration, focused on the success of their communities, to a lower frequency, focused on the survival and success of the individual.
teaser: Explore the spiritual beliefs of sentient beings from planets 1, 2, and 3. Jason Rice describes how they lived in harmony with their environment and how an invasion shifted them into a lower vibration focused on the individual rather than the community.

title: Telepathy and Communication with E.T.s
body: At our current state of evolution, we all have the ability to learn and understand new forms of physical languages. And as Emery Smith explains, we are evolving into a higher state of being as many people are discovering their ability to communicate telepathically. This is a skill he learned during his time within the compartmentalized programs, that served him well as he interacted with several telepathic species of extraterrestrials. During this discussion, he conveys the benefits and challenges with this subtle form of communication.
teaser: As we evolve, it is important to understand the benefits, challenges, and subtleties of telepathic communication. Guest Emery Smith describes his training in telepathy and experiences with telepathic ET co-workers deep within compartmentalized programs.

title: Seven E.T. Species
body: Throughout his career within the secret space program, Jason Rice had direct encounters with seven different extraterrestrial species. He details the physical appearance, behaviors and strengths attributed to each of these beings. He also explains why secret organizations and corporations took active interest in collecting body parts of the genetically created hybrid creatures that constituted invading forces on these worlds.
teaser: Jason Rice describes the physical appearance, behaviors, and strengths of seven different ET species that he encountered in the secret space program. Discover why some organizations and corporations have taken an active interest in these hybrid beings.

title: Modern Advances from E.T. Tech
body: During his time within the special access compartmentalized programs, Emery Smith worked with advanced alien technology and exotic materials recovered from crashed alien crafts. He describes the various frequency-based devices and consciousness-assisted technologies that were integral parts of extraterrestrial vehicles. Many of these ships were living beings themselves, formed in space with sound, based upon the genetic code of the pilot. As big corporations continue to find new uses for this tech, much of it is trickling its way into mainstream use as new materials and devices.
teaser: Emery Smith worked with advanced alien technology and exotic materials recovered from crashed alien crafts.

title: A Harrowing Journey Begins for a New Insider
body: Tony Rodrigues is a new insider to come forward, sharing his accounts of his time within the secret space program. The harrowing details of his service began as a 9-year old, abducted from his bed by reptilian beings, who telepathically got his permission to induct him into a 20 & Back Program. His brief training on the moon included watching mind-control movies and several surgeries to augments the capabilities of his body. From there, he and a group of other boys are whisked away to Mars where they became support troops for well-armed and armored soldiers.
teaser: Tony Rodrigues reveals memories of starting the 20 & Back Program as a 9-year old child.

title: From Mars to Ceres and Beyond
body: After being severely wounded and miraculously healed, Tony Rodrigues’s story takes him to a secret base on Ceres. After his support soldier assignment is canceled, he is given a number of aptitude tests to determine the next course of his career. Soon, he is shipped off to a German colony on the Ceres asteroid where he is trained in ship maintenance. As the years wear on, he is soon promoted to Cargo Engineer aboard ships tasked with the collection of alien technology. All the while, he learns the lengths his superiors will go to gain access to higher degrees of advanced alien technology.
teaser: Tony Rodrigues is shipped off to a German colony on the Ceres asteroid where he is trained in ship maintenance and learns many other things about the SSP.

title: Fragmented Memories of 20 & Back
body: As the completion of his service term nears, Tony Rodrigues is about to enter the most mysterious part of the secret space programs, the return portion of 20 & Back. He admits that what he endured is still baffling to him, as he began his journey as a 9-year old boy, served 20 years, only to return to the same age he left. Years later, as his memories came flooding back, he is working to put many of these scattered fragments together to understand fully what happened to him. Currently, he in contact with many others who are also struggling to make sense of their fragmented memories.
teaser: Tony Rodrigues recounts his baffling memories of the 20 & Back Program and how he is working to make sense of what happened.

title: Psychic Training in IDARF
body: Intuitive empaths, telepaths and other psychic assets are essential for the success of the secret space program. Jason Rice describes the testing and training he recieved, with IDARF, that put him into a line of service as an intuitive empath. Though he was born with natural abilities, he was given nanites and training to boost his empathic talents. During his time, he was able to effectively communicate with some E.T. species and endure psychic attacks from hostile aliens.
teaser: Jason Rice describes the training and testing he recieved in IDARF to boost his natural psychic abilities.

title: Invasion of the Hybrid Spiders
body: How do you stop a powerful invasive force? --with maximum firepower. During his deployment on Callidus 3, the planet was invaded by a massive and terrifying alien species that Jason Rice refers to as a hybrid spider. He describes what they looked like, how they moved, and how they perceived their environment despite their lack of eyes. More importantly, he discusses why these creatures were created, the nefarious plot underlying this invasive force, and what it took to finally defeat them.
teaser: Discover why the hybrid spider creatures were created, their goals in invading, and what it took to defeat them on Callidus 3.

title: Inner Earth: Descent
body: Perhaps one of the strangest parts of Emery Smith's work within the compartmentalized programs was his missions into caverns deep underground. Before he could undertake such operations, specialized training and briefings were essential, for him to become an integral part of the exploratory teams. He offers us an introduction into the operations, technology, flora and fauna that are all a part of his descent into the inner Earth.
teaser: Explore the flora and fauna living deep within the earth. Emery Smith describes the operations, training, and technology required for this unique mission.

title: Inner Earth: Missions
body: ome areas of the inner earth are so strange that it is like being on another planet, within our own planet. Emery Smith describes the technology and functions he was tasked with during his missions to explore and take samples from many subterranean caverns.  He reveals that an important part of the way missions are conducted builds compartmentalization so that even the crew undertaking these missions do not know the full scope of the operation.
teaser: Inner earth is so strange it's like another planet. Emery Smith details the technology and functions of these specialized exploration missions.

title: Rebuilding Callidus 3
body: Finally, the last of the hybrid spiders on Callidus 3 have been defeated and a new campaign of reconstruction begins. As memories continue to resurface for Jason Rice, he recalls his efforts in rebuilding Callidus 3 and the many pitfalls this planet faced as they struggled to salvage what was left of their infrastructure. With the instillation of a new government, secretly run by the Draco, a rising rebellion became a dangerous force to contend with as they sabotaged many of the rebuilding projects.
teaser: Explore the politics and dangers involved in rebuilding the infrastructure of Callidus 3 after the hybrid spider invasion. Jason Rice recalls these reconstruction efforts.

title: Recovering from 20 Years of Service
body: Twenty years after he was returned to Earth, a flood of memories, with no context to place them, plagued Jason Rice. He explains that this is a common occurrence for soldiers returning from the 20 & Back program, as they struggle to deal with a life of PTSD, night terrors and other mental health issues. Many of them are left with no understanding of the source for their struggles. Despite promises made by recruiters, it seems that the parting gifts from the secret space programs are not what anyone expected or deserve.
teaser: Join Jason Rice as he discusses his struggle to deal with the confusing and fragmented memories that confronted him years after his return from the 20 & Back program.

title: Inner Earth: Microclimates
body: There are pockets within the inner earth that have their own atmosphere, creating microclimates that are ideally suited for unique forms of life thriving there. Emery Smith takes us to places within our planet, where the sun has never shined. Yet, life can be found to be flourishing; life that appears alien to us. Some of the creatures he describes may be the origin of many cryptozoological sightings.
teaser: Explore the various microclimates of inner earth that support many strange, alien-like creatures. Emery Smith describes his experiences and the possible origins of various cryptozoological sightings.

title: Inner Earth: Diversity of Life
body: During his inner earth missions, Emery Smith was tasked with taking samples from the myriad of plants flourishing in the subterranean climates. What he found, is that there is more life on our planet than we could ever imagine, and the diversity of that life that expands exponentially the deeper we go below the surface. He describes his encounters with exotic subterranean flora, many of which can be beneficial for our health and wellbeing. Some turned out to be very dangerous, and a few were delicious.
teaser: Explore the diversity of plant life thriving in subterranean climates. Emery Smith describes the samples he collected that were dangerous, delicious, and far beyond his wildest imaginings.

title: Reverse Engineered Technologies
body: John Lear has access to the people who worked to reverse-engineer technology gained from civilizations originating on other worlds. Despite attempts to conceal these special projects, he reveals that a great deal of technology from other worlds has made it into the hands of powerful aerospace corporations that will do anything to keep their secrets.  In this discussion with Emery Smith, he describes the technology used to fuel interstellar vehicles, what it is like to traverse vast distances across the cosmos, and why many of these extraterrestrial beings take an active interest in life on our planet.
teaser: John Lear reveals E.T. tech that has made it into the hands of powerful aerospace corporations that will do anything to keep their secrets.

title: Secrets of the Living Moon
body: John Lear brings forward information pertaining to the artificial origin of our moon and the flurry of extraterrestrial activity sprawling across its surface as well as deep underground. In this discussion with Emery Smith, he explains that maintaining the secrecy of this activity requires a massive portion of the publicly-known space program’s budget and active disinformation programs. According to insiders, our solar system is a major hub for civilizations from across the galaxy and the Earth’s moon has become integral for aliens monitoring everything happening upon our planet.
teaser: John Lear discusses with Emery Smith information pertaining to the artificial origin of our moon and the flurry of extraterrestrial activity sprawling across its surface as well as deep underground.

title: Area 51 and Secret Underground Facilities
body: All across the world are vast underground complexes connected by highspeed rail systems that are home to specialized compartmentalized programs. John Lear has personal contact with individuals who worked in places like these, such as Sandia and Dulce. In this discussion with Emery Smith, he shares what he learned about their construction and the types of secret programs currently being conducted and describes his own personal experiences traveling to Area 51.
teaser: John Lear discusses with Emery Smith what he learned about the construction of different types of secret programs currently being conducted and describes his own personal experiences traveling to Area 51.

title: Levels of Top Secret
body: How deep are the secrets at the highest levels of top secret? John Lear, in this discussion with Emery Smith, takes us deeper into the intricate web of deceit that goes into concealing secret projects, including the many levels of top-secret clearance and the degree of E.T. assistance in managing these programs. We even gain a bit of insight into the agenda of those running these secret programs. Plus, he discusses one of the major areas in the county for secret technology development and testing, right in the heart of Las Vegas, Nevada.
teaser: How deep are the secrets at the highest levels of top secret? John Lear, in this discussion with Emery Smith, takes us deeper into the intricate web of deceit that goes into concealing secret projects, including the many levels of top-secret clearance .

title: Submarines Under America
body: How can there be an undersea warfare center located deep in the desert of Nevada? Is something secret taking place far under the surface of America? In this interview with Emery Smith, John Lear dives into the notion that there is a vast ocean, or a network of waterways, underlying the continental shelf of North America. This lends credence to the rumors of secret underwater facilities built far inland with hidden aquatic connections to the deeper oceans.
teaser: John Lear dives into the notion that there is a vast ocean or network of waterways underlying the continental shelf of North America.

title: E.T. Collaborations at Groom Lake
body: John Lear discusses, with Emery Smith, what he has learned about the various extraterrestrial civilizations that are here on Earth today. He explains that some are here, willingly, working alongside humans in secret facilities including Pine Gap and Groom Lake. As their collaborations continue, the military and many industries gain the benefit as long as they never reveal their otherworldly sources. In addition to the technological advances they are bringing to our planet, a primary concern of these beings is the advancement of the human soul.
teaser: John Lear discusses what he has learned about the various extraterrestrial civilizations that are here on Earth today. He explains that some are here, willingly, working alongside humans in secret facilities including Pine Gap and Groom Lake.

title: Secret Civilizations of Our Solar System
body: John Lear discusses, with Emery Smith, different types of civilizations that are currently living throughout our solar system, describing how they live and why they are here. He brings to light many of the details he has learned about the actual number of planets in our solar system and the prevalence of life throughout.  All of this is kept secret, from us, by using vast resources to obscure the truth and cast a wide net of disinformation across the planet.
teaser: John Lear discusses, with Emery Smith, different types of civilizations that are currently living throughout our solar system, describing how they live and why they are here. He brings to light many of the details he has learned.

title: Randy Cramer: Hybrid Soldier for the SSP
body: Randy Cramer, a former member of the U.S. Marine Corps, comes forward to tell of his experiences within the 20 & Back program as a genetically and technologically augmented soldier. During his 20-years in a top secret space program, he fought indigenous insectoids on Mars, patrolled the solar system defending Earth from potential UFO invaders, and was sent on missions to other worlds. Through all of his harrowing encounters, perhaps his greatest challenge was being returned to civilian life and facing a flood of memories of a life in the 20 & Back. As part of his testimony, he submits to a Polygraph examination and answers some challenging questions.
teaser: Randy Cramer comes forward to tell of his experiences within the 20 & Back program as a genetically and technologically augmented solider. As part of his testimony, he submits to a Polygraph examination and answers some challenging questions.

title: Who Runs the SSP?
body: During his tour of duty with the military-based Secret Space Programs, Randy Cramer had the occasional run in with members of the corporate run SSPs. He found that at the heart of it all is a vast roundtable made up of hundreds of groups and agencies, not all of which are from Earth. He explains to Emery Smith that each holds a stake in running clandestine ventures into the cosmos and the future for life on Earth. Randy cautions that a big change for all of these players is soon to transpire.
teaser: Randy Cramer discusses who holds a stake in running clandestine ventures into the cosmos and the impact for the future of life on Earth.

title: Welcome to Mars!
body: What happens if someone dies during the 20 & Back? This is something Emery Smiths asks, as we delve deeper into the details of the various missions which have taken Randy Cramer to other worlds. We glean insights into the psionic nature of the indigenous beings on Mars, how they communicate, and the unusual nature of their lifecycle. He also describes the environmental suits, different vehicles and propulsion systems that he used. The information revealed is nothing less than spectacular.
teaser: What happens if someone dies during the 20 & Back? This is something Emery Smiths asks, as we delve deeper into the details of the various missions which have taken Randy Cramer to other worlds.

title: Human - E.T. Relations
body: Through his adventures across the cosmos, Randy Cramer has interacted with many different types of extraterrestrial beings. Some species were emotional and psychically affected by emotions. While other beings were very intellectual and not very emotional. Emery Smith compares his experiences with the same types of beings, during his time with the special access compartmentalized programs. In every case, they had to develop new skills for interacting with these people. This included special psionic training he received from the reptoid beings on Mars, and a romantic relationship with a woman on another world with whom he had a child. Emery Smith compares his experiences with the same types of beings, during his time with the special access compartmentalized programs.
teaser: Through his adventures across the cosmos, Randy Cramer has interacted with many different types of extraterrestrial beings. In every case, he had to develop new skills for interacting with these people.

title: Intergalactic Trade
body: What makes for a civilized world in our galaxy? Many planets host technological advanced cultures, yet not all of them live up to certain galactic standards. Randy Cramer has visited and interacted with several species of extraterrestrial peoples living on distant worlds. He describes what he has learned about their cultures and customs. Binding them together, is a vast trade system, of which Earth is a part. He discusses common materials traded, as well as the regulations governing trade and interplanetary relations. Some of the standards imposed by this loose-knit organization may be what is protecting many worlds, and keep others isolated.
teaser: Randy Cramer has visited and interacted with several species of extraterrestrial peoples living on distant worlds. He describes what he has learned about their cultures and customs. Binding them together, is a vast trade system, of which Earth is a part.

title: The Importance of Earth
body: What is so important about Earth that has incited many extraterrestrial species to take active interest in our world? The answer may lie deep within the core of the planet. Randy Cramer shares his knowledge of extraterrestrials living on Earth, inside the crust, and deep within the oceans. He explains to Emery Smith that many of these beings have been here for a long time. Some have their own interests in mind, and many share a common one. As we delve deeper into this subject, we uncover the universal geometry underlying humanoid forms and why Earth draws so much interest, throughout the cosmos.
teaser: Randy Cramer shares his knowledge of extraterrestrials living on Earth, inside the crust, and deep within the oceans.

title: Alien and Human Tech
body: What if the technology used by the secret space programs was not as strange and outlandish as we have imagined? From domestic tools to the design of vehicles, many of the things used in space are already familiar to us. Randy Cramer and Emery Smith engage in a discussion of the technology forbidden to those of us on Earth but are commonplace within the covert space programs. Much of what they describe will be readily familiar to us, simply because the physics between humanoid species is universal. Plus, we learn about technology, such as Dyson Spheres, that is so far advanced that we can barely fathom its scale.
teaser: What if the technology used by the secret space programs was not as strange and outlandish as we have imagined? From domestic tools to the design of vehicles, many of the things used in space are already familiar to us.

title: Non-Humanoid E.T.s
body: The universe is a strange place filled with many strange beings that do not look like humans, in any way. During his time within the covert military space programs, Randy Cramer did encountered many humanoid beings. He also came across many varied and strange non-humanoid beings. He tells Emery Smith about many of the extraterrestrial beings that he had direct encounters with. We learn about insectoids on mars, shark-like aliens, various reptoids, and even avian-type beings.
teaser: The universe is a strange place filled with many strange beings that do not look like humans, in any way. During his time within the covert military space programs, Randy Cramer did encountered many humanoid beings.

title: E.T. Recovery Missions
body: During his military career, Clifford Stone was tasked with the recovery of bodies and technology from crashed alien craft. It was an especially stressful duty that was compounded by his special psychic abilities. Emery Smith has direct experiences with such operations himself. Together they share many commonalities of their experiences, working to rescue and recover injured extraterrestrials and the strange technology they encountered inside these otherworldly vehicles.
teaser: During his military career, Clifford Stone was tasked with the recovery of bodies and technology from crashed alien craft. It was an especially stressful duty that was compounded by his special psychic abilities.

title: E.T.s on Earth
body: Clifford Stone was granted special access to extraterrestrial beings, so that he could learn how they communicate and why they are here. This enabled him to have many unique interactions with several types of beings on our planet. He shares with Emery Smith some of his emotional encounters with alien beings, some of which were unwilling “guests” of the U.S. government. From all of these encounters, he was able to ascertain the motivation underlying the presence of these highly advanced beings and what their long-term interests are for humanity.
teaser: Clifford Stone was granted special access to extraterrestrial beings, so that he could learn how they communicate and why they are here. This enabled him to have many unique interactions with several types of beings on our planet.

title: Secret Recovery Teams
body: In 1942 a special operation unit was created in the U.S. Army to investigate and collect crashed alien craft and move them to a safe place for experts to exploit the advanced technology. Clifford Stone discusses various teams, such as projects Blue Fly and Moon Dust, tasked to recover objects and technology of non-Earth origin. Many of these operations are black-funded projects.
teaser: Clifford Stone discusses various teams, such as projects Blue Fly and Moon Dust, tasked to recover objects and technology of non-Earth origin. Many of these operations are black-funded projects.

title: Vietnam Recovery Operations
body: Many of the E.T. recovery operations during the Vietnam War are still considered highly classified with elaborate cover stories to keep the details concealed. Clifford Stone was there and reveals details from his experiences with extraterrestrial and their crashed crafts in South East Asia during the 1970s. He also tells us the cover stories he was given, should the public get word of these operations.
teaser: Clifford Stone reveals details from his experiences with extraterrestrial and their crashed crafts in South East Asia during the 1970s. He also tells us the cover stories he was given, should the public get word of these operations.

title: U.S. UFO Research Begins
body: Clifford Stone discusses the moment the U.S. Government decided they needed to investigate the presence of extraterrestrial beings. This came with an order from Douglas MacArthur to General Doolittle to find out what was behind the many reports of “foo-fighters” during WWII. What they found warranted deeper and more extensive investigation of crash sites to recover advanced tech. He also shares, for the first time on camera, a strange piece of metal he personally recovered from a crash site.
teaser: Clifford Stone discusses the moment the U.S. Government decided they needed to investigate the presence of extraterrestrial beings. This came with an order from Douglas MacArthur  to find out what was behind the reports of foo-fighters during WWII.

title: E.T. Rx
body: Clifford Stone discusses his knowledge of a book used by medics to guide them in giving immediate medical care for injured extraterrestrials. He explains that the book offers details of 57 different alien species that have been known to visit our world. This includes three types of greys, which he shares his personal experience with. He also shares his life-long communication with a being known as Korona.
teaser: Clifford Stone discusses his knowledge of a book used by medics to guide them in giving immediate medical care for injured extraterrestrials. He explains that the book offers details of 57 different alien species that have been known to visit our world.

title: Inside Alien Craft
body: Clifford Stone has inside information on UFOs because he has been inside them. During his time with the special operations program, there were times Clifford Stone was ordered to enter alien craft. He explains that there was no way to know what to expect. Many times, it was scary. He describes many of the craft he has seen, from the outside, and the inside. He says that within many of them, it is like entering an alternate reality.
teaser: Clifford Stone has inside information on UFOs because he has been inside them. He describes many of the craft he has seen, from the outside, and the inside.

title: E.T. Telepathy
body: Thought transfer, or telepathy, is the best way to communicate with extraterrestrial beings. Clifford Stone discusses his experiences of telepathic contact with extraterrestrial beings and how he learned this. Beyond basic communication, this power can be used to manipulate people into certain behaviors, not necessarily to their detriment. He offers tips that we can use when we want to reach out and make a telepathic connection with extraterrestrial beings.
teaser: Thought transfer, or telepathy, is the best way to communicate with extraterrestrial beings. Clifford Stone discusses his experiences of telepathic contact with extraterrestrial beings and how he learned this.

title: Entering Area 51
body: As we launch into a new season David Adair, the Rocket Man, brings to light new information never before revealed on camera. At 17 years old, in 1971, David Adair was taken to the secret facilities under Groom Lake, commonly known as Area 51. This began his descent into the secret projects. He describes some of the advanced vehicles and technology he encountered, much of which is still far more advanced than what we are using, today. But his story begins when he was 12, as a series of dreams told him how to create a device that would become a fusion containment drive. His interest in rocketry was less about the vehicles, and more about the power source for propulsion. This is what caught the eye of the military who brought him to work on secret projects.
teaser: As we launch into a new season David Adair brings new information never before revealed on camera. At 17 years old, he was taken to the secret facilities under Groom Lake, commonly known as Area 51. This began his descent into the secret projects.

title: Building and Destroying Pitholem
body: David Adair was tasked with creating a powerful rocket unlike anything ever seen before. It was to be built from a strange material of unknown origin, known as carbnite. He describes his inspiration and the process for creating his most powerful invention that he dubbed, Pitholem. When he discovered why the military wanted his rocket, he did the unthinkable and destroyed it.
teaser: David Adair was tasked with creating a powerful rocket unlike anything ever seen before. It was to be built from a strange material of unknown origin, known as carbnite. He dubbed it, Pitholem.

title: Theory of Time Travel
body: Time is not what we think, nor are the timelines as fragile as we have been led to believe. David Adair discusses his understanding of time travel, the technology involved, and what happens when someone changes something in the past. His understandings come from working directly with J. Allen Hynek in the Bermuda Triangle, and following in the footsteps of Tesla as he assisted in the Philadelphia Experiment project. He found this same sort of technology with UFOs visiting our planet.
teaser: Time is not what we think, nor are the timelines as fragile as we have been led to believe. David Adair discusses his understanding of time travel, the technology involved, and what happens when someone changes something in the past.

title: Why They Are Here
body: David Adair brings forward some of the secret information he gathered, while working in the secret programs, pertaining to the intentions of extraterrestrial civilization on Earth. He discusses alien interventions that include deactivation of ICBMs and the diversion of three CME’s poised to strike the Earth. While the debate rages whether or not aliens are on the planet, there are some who are certain of it and their goal is to ascertain as to why they are here.
teaser: David Adair brings forward some of the secret information he gathered, while working in the secret programs, pertaining to the intentions of extraterrestrial civilization on Earth.

title: Decline of NASA
body: What happened with our space program? America’s exploration into space was once the pinnacle of patriotic pride. Now it seems to be only a slight footnote in our daily news. David Adair discusses the highs and lows of the developments in NASA and government-based space programs. He explains why we once set foot on the moon and why it is now nearly impossible to put people into orbit.
teaser: David Adair discusses the highs and lows of the developments in NASA and government-based space programs. He explains why we once set foot on the moon and why it is now nearly impossible to put people into orbit.

title: Behind the Mission
body: David Adair is here to fulfill a mission. He takes us back to the strange encounter that set him upon the path of his work that would dub him as the Rocket Man. Does he know how we can achieve trans-dimensional jumping that would project human beings to the Andromeda galaxy within six minutes? From the way he received his life’s mission to bizarre facts about his physiology, we learn many new things about David Adair. More than we could ever imagine.
teaser: David Adair is here to fulfill a mission. He takes us back to the strange encounter that set him upon the path of his work that would dub him as the Rocket Man. We learn many new things about David Adair. More than we could ever imagine.

title: Alien Abduction Programs
body: The alien catch and release program is what David Adair calls it when people are abducted by aliens and returned. Betty and Barney Hill are perhaps the best-known of such abductees. In this program, beings, not always extraterrestrial, abduct humans, alter them in strange ways, then release them back into the world. Most often with dreadful results.
teaser: The alien catch and release program is what David Adair calls it when people are abducted by aliens and returned. In this process, people are altered in strange ways, then released back into the world. Most often with dreadful results.

title: Threats to Our Electrical Grid
body: In this final episode of Season 17, David Adair gets all charged up about the threat we face from solar flares and EMPs. He explains that the solution is very simple, and cost effective, but there is only one thing preventing us from fully protecting ourselves – politics. This is a topic that he is passionate about as the lasting effects are horrendous, but the solution is readily available and affordable in any economy. He shares his plan for finally getting things moving to protect our civilization from an electrical grid disaster.
teaser: David Adair gets all charged up about the threat we face from solar flares and EMPs. He explains that the solution is very simple, and cost effective, but there is only one thing preventing us from fully protecting ourselves – politics.

title: Patrolling the Solar System
body: Randy Cramer returns to reveal details from many of the missions he experienced during his years with the secret space program. He describes what life was like on an intergalactic craft tasked with patrolling the solar system in search of E.T.s not following the rules of established shipping lanes. The details he reveals includes technology onboard the ship, the craft he flew, and exo-suits with technology that enabled superhuman capabilities. This is only just the beginning of the details revealed.
teaser: Randy Cramer returns to reveal details from many of the missions he experienced during his years with the secret space program. He describes what life was like on an intergalactic craft tasked with patrolling the solar system in search of E.T.s

title: Weapons of the SSP
body: As a combat operative, Randy Cramer was trained in the use of weapons far in advance of what is available to conventional military forces on Earth. He describes various ranged weapons from rail guns to plasma rifles that are in use by human-based military forces. He also gives us a rundown of the hand-to-hand tactics and weapons he was trained in. Plus, we get a taste of the weapons used by extraterrestrial forces.
teaser: As a combat operative, Randy Cramer was trained in the use of weapons far in advance of what is available to conventional military forces on Earth. He describes various ranged weapons, hand-to-hand tactics, and E.T. weapons.

title: Operational Craft of the SSP
body: The secret space programs could not exist without vehicles that traverse the vast distances between planets and solar systems. Randy Cramer demonstrates that humanity is one of the more creative species as evidenced by the number of different types of spacecraft humans use. Each kind is ideally suited for different operations such as: fighters, shuttles, carriers, destroyers and Juggernauts. He also describes some E.T. craft such as mother ships, scout crafts and planet sized ships capable of providing for entire civilizations, over the course of centuries.
teaser: The secret space programs could not exist without vehicles that traverse the vast distances between planets and solar systems. Randy Cramer describes the craft he used and experienced, including: fighters, shuttles, carriers, destroyers and Juggernauts.

title: Deeper into the Inner Earth
body: Deep within the honeycomb structure our planet, lay biomes so diverse we can scarcely fathom variety of life thriving there. Some we have heard of, like the Agarthan Network, Post-Atlantean civilizations, Raptors, and Ant people. But deeper below these are caverns where we find creatures from ancient times. Beings that are highly intelligent, yet massive in size with the appearance of monsters. Randy Cramer discusses his personal encounters and missions to these inner-planetary places and reveals some of the technology and beings that are commonplace within these realms.
teaser: Deep within the honeycomb structure our planet, lay biomes so diverse we cannot fathom variety of life. Randy Cramer discusses his encounters with these inner-planetary places and reveals some of the technology and beings within these realms.

title: Jupiter Space Station
body: Orbiting Jupiter is a gigantic space station built by an intergalactic trade commission to maintain galactic commerce operations. It is a place where many species gather to share their wares, technology, and information. Randy Cramer walks us through his experiences aboard this station. He describes its size, the technology, and the accommodations for different civilizations who conduct business there.
teaser: Randy Cramer walks us through his experiences aboard the Jupiter Space Station. He describes its size, the technology, and the accommodations for different civilizations who conduct business there.

title: Time Wars
body: Imagine waking up, every morning to find that the world around you has changed. This is a reality for the members of the Time Corp, who are engaging in a war that we only experience through the Mandala Effect. The Time Corp is an organization that answers to no one, but they do what they must to ensure that humanity’s time stream runs clean and clear of malevolent influence by E.T.s. Randy Cramer tells us of his experience with members of the Time Corp, how they operate, and the theories underlying time travel and timelines merging.
teaser: Randy Cramer tells us of his experience with members of the Time Corp, how they operate, and the theories underlying time travel and timelines merging.

title: Randy Cramer on Disclosure
body: We keep hearing reports of impending events which will initiate major disclosures of advanced technology and our history E.T.s. Yet, they never seem to manifest. Randy Cramer unravels many of the intricate layers involved with the approval of potential disclosure scenarios. What we discover, is that there are many players pulling the strings, who carefully plot the gradual progress of disclosure until a major event transpires, which undeniably confirms the presence of alien life on Earth. Perhaps the most important part of these revelations is the effect it will have on our collective consciousness.
teaser: We keep hearing reports of impending events which will initiate major disclosures, but they never seem to manifest. Randy Cramer unravels many of the intricate layers involved with the approval of potential disclosure scenarios.

title: Contact with Interdimensionals
body: Randy Cramer reveals how we can tune our minds to become aware of beings who exists in different layers of reality. We are surrounded by beings capable of transiting across dimensions. In fact, we are multidimensional beings, ourselves. We may perceive these as UFOs, aliens, ghosts or hauntings. To help us become aware of where these beings exists and what we can do to experience them, we need to understand the layers of reality as expressed through dimensions, densities and the overtones between them.
teaser: Randy Cramer reveals how we can tune our minds to become aware of beings who exists in different layers of reality. We are surrounded by beings capable of transiting across dimensions.

title: First Contact: The Apunians
