body: Ricardo González is a contactee, researcher and author, from Peru, who has direct interaction with an extraterrestrial species from Alpha Centauri known as the Apunians. His extraordinary experiences began in infancy and continue to this day. Their first contact with Humans originated in Peru as the first civilizations were born. But they have been here much longer as they were one of the original seeders of life on our planet. Their mission on Earth continues to this day because we are all connected through a chain of evolution which will take us into a new level of existence as we awaken our full potential.
teaser: Ricardo González is a contactee, researcher and author, from Peru, who has direct interaction with an extraterrestrial species from Alpha Centauri known as the Apunians. His extraordinary experiences began in infancy and continue to this day.

title: Apunians' Mission
body: Through his contact with the Apunians, Ricardo González is able to relay the complex origin of life in this universe and the intervention of E.T. groups on human civilization. Our collective evolution is an important part of why they are here. But they are not the only ones who have had a hand in charting the course of human history. This is realized as we examine ancient tales of sibling gods battling for rule over humanity. Despite the eons of conflict and pain, humanity will evolve because of love, which is at the heart of the Apunians' mission.
teaser: Through his contact with the Apunians, Ricardo González is able to relay the complex origin of life in this universe and the intervention of E.T. groups on human civilization. Humanity will evolve because of love and the Apunians' mission.

title: Mission to Alpha Centauri
body: The secret space program to Alpha Centauri is already underway with the help of beings from Earth’s nearest star. Through his direct contact with the Apunians, Ricardo González has learned that many of the people who are helping this program get off of the ground are descendants from human beings who travelled there from Earth. But they may actually be from our future. He explains that this program is part of an international collective with many countries participating, independent from any government.
teaser: The secret space program to Alpha Centauri is already underway. Ricardo González has learned that many of the people who are helping this program get off of the ground are descendants from human beings who travelled there from Earth.

title: From Channeling to Contact
body: Throughout his life, Ricardo González has connected with and communicated with intelligent beings from Alpha Centauri, called the Apunians. Initially these connections came as channeled messages, of which he was cautious. But one day in the desert, he was brought aboard one of their ships to meet them face-to-face. He shares details of his experience with their craft and interacting directly with the Apunians. We learn more about their consciousness-integrating technology and the message of why they are here interacting with humanity today.
teaser: Throughout his life, Ricardo González has communicated with intelligent beings called the Apunians. Initially these connections came as channeled messages. But one day he was brought aboard one of their ships to meet them face-to-face.

title: Remembering the Life of William Tompkins
body:
Dr. Robert Wood, along with Emery Smith, remembers the fascinating life work of William Tompkins who was essential in designing many of the craft used in the secret space programs. Throughout his longstanding Naval career, William Tompkins worked on projects that many people have never heard of or refuse to believe exist. After his time in the Navy, he moved into the aerospace sector becoming integral in designing much of the SSP technology. He was also involved in remote viewing and had access to secret underground tunnel system underlying North America. 

All the while, he claimed that he had help from Nordic beings who had great interest in covert and overt space programs.

Dr. Robert Wood is a researcher and editor of two books written by Tompkins about his life and career, titled: Selected by Extraterrestrials Volumes 1 and 2. He also had a long career in the aerospace industry working with many of the same companies and people as William Tompkins.

After a longstanding Naval career, William Tompkins designed advanced vehicles for aerospace companies, including TRW, North American Aviation, Northrop and Douglas Aircraft Company. He even assisted with the Saturn and Apollo Space Programs for NASA.
teaser: Dr. Robert Wood, along with Emery Smith, remembers the fascinating life work of William Tompkins who was essential in designing many of the craft used in the secret space programs.

title: SSP Think Tank
body: Dr. Robert Wood discusses the career of William Tompkins with Emery Smith. This includes his involvement with Nordic E.T.s, the influence of MJ-12, and the development of the Solar Warden program. After his career in the Navy, William Tompkins became an integral part of the civilian aerospace sector, becoming a part of a secret space program think tank which designed advanced vehicles and technology.
teaser: Dr. Robert Wood discusses the career of William Tompkins with Emery Smith. This includes his involvement with Nordic E.T.s, the influence of MJ-12, and the development of the Solar Warden program.

title: Secret Space Program Missions
body: As William Tompkins became essential for designing ships for the SSP, he learned some of their deeper secrets, including details on the 20 & Back program. Dr. Robert Wood reveals how Tompkins got into designing space craft as a means of trying to solve the UFO problem plaguing government leaders. This led to him becoming aware of age regression and life extension programs used for Navy personnel assigned to off-world duties. We explore the rise of the Interplanetary Corporate Conglomerate and electro-gravitic propulsion used for their spacecraft.
teaser: As William Tompkins became essential for designing ships for the SSP, he learned some of their deeper secrets, including details on the 20 & Back program.

title: Solar Warden
body: Solar Warden is one of the most important aspects of the secret space program as it is tasked with protecting our solar system from unwanted invaders. Dr. Robert Wood reveals the role William Tompkins played in designing huge ships, various utility crafts, and technological designs for the SSP’s flagship program. He also shares details of Tompkins’s testimonial of witnessing the Battle of Los Angeles in 1942 and the role he played in the search for E.T. underwater and underground bases.
teaser: Dr. Robert Wood reveals the role William Tompkins played in designing huge ships, various utility crafts, and technological designs for the SSP’s flagship program, Solar Warden.

title: Secrets of the Apollo Missions
body: From mysterious symbols to alien contact on the moon, there are many secrets of the Apollo missions. Dr. Robert Wood and Emery Smith discuss that William Tompkins was invited into the secret side of this project where he gained a unique perspective of the technology, the secrets kept, and what the astronauts really experienced as they set foot upon the moon. He was integral in designing the command center and the Nova missions which were to continue human exploration deeper into space.
teaser: William Tompkins was invited into the secret side of the Apollo Missions where he gained a unique perspective of the technology, the secrets kept, and what the astronauts really experienced as they set foot upon the moon.

title: Interstellar Travel & Remote Viewing
body: As a child, William Tompkins could remote view without the formalized training. He called this special ability “flying” and used it to see secret locations to scout designs for his models and then future designs for the SSP. Dr. Robert Wood and Emery Smith discuss what Tompkins knew of various methods of interstellar travel and the benefits of Remote Viewing. Included with Tompkins’s work is an understanding of the less-than-special place our planet holds compared to the rest of the galaxy.
teaser: As a child, William Tompkins could remote view without the formalized training. He called this special ability “flying” and used it to see secret locations to scout designs for his models and then future designs for the SSP.

title: Draco Agenda
body: For many years, humanity has been held under the thumb of the Draco Agenda. In this latest testimonial from Dr. Robert Wood, he shares with Emery Smith what William Tompkins knew about the long-term presence of the Draco, their implementation of mind control over us, and the establishment of a galactic slave trade syndicate. Perhaps the pinnacle of this revelation is a photograph of what Tompkins believes is a Draco ship.
teaser: Dr. Robert Wood, shares with Emery Smith what William Tompkins knew about the long-term presence of the Draco, their implementation of mind control over us, and the establishment of a galactic slave trade syndicate.

title: Disclosure: Why Not Now?
body: Randy Veitenheimer and Emery Smith discuss the ever-changing landscape of secrecy and the slow release forbidden technology. Little by little, the disclosure is happening, playing out in subtle ways through mainstream and social media. They look into such questions as, why now? What has changed and what’s causing all this? They also discuss what it will take for us to bypass corporate controls and bring more of this tech to the public view.
teaser: Randy Veitenheimer and Emery Smith discuss the ever-changing landscape of secrecy and the slow release forbidden technology. They look into such questions as, why now? What has changed and what’s causing all this?

title: Non-local Travel & Portals
body: Randy Veitenheimer and Emery Smith expand our horizons of thinking when it comes to non-local travel and interdimensional portals. Being able to travel to distant stars is an integral part of the secret space programs. Part of that travel includes time dislocation to reduce travel times and using portals to instantaneously connect distant locations. An oft overlooked factor that is crucial to all of these methods of movement is consciousness and the directed focus of intention.
teaser: Randy Veitenheimer and Emery Smith expand our horizons of thinking when it comes to non-local travel and interdimensional portals. An oft overlooked factor to these methods of movement is consciousness and the directed focus of intention.

title: Special Investigations Agent: Richard Doty
body: Richard Doty is a new insider who comes forward to share his personal experience working in Area 51 and Kirtland Air Force base. He is a retired special agent who worked within the Air Force’s Office of Special Investigations (AFOSI) who was assigned to investigate ET contacts. In our introduction to his career, he gives Emery Smith a glimpse inside the investigation process and how it brought him to work at classified locations like Area 51. He shares one of his experiences with a strange extraterrestrial creature that escaped from Papoose Site 5 near Groom Lake. Plus, he reveals what we learned from the EBENs that crashed at Roswell, concerning their use of time travel, communication devices, and directed energy beam weapons (DEW).
teaser: Richard Doty has personal experience working in Area 51 and Kirtland Airforce base. He is a retired special agent who worked within the Air Force’s Office of Special Investigations (AFOSI) who was assigned to investigate ET contacts.

title: Field Investigations with Contactees
body: Richard Doty reveals to Emery Smith the most fascinating extraterrestrial contact case of his entire career. His work with the Air Force’s Office of Special Investigations included investigating cases of alien contactees such as Raymond Powtroisky. Over the course of ten years, Powtroisky was visited many times by three beings who arrived in a huge UFO. They showed him where they were from and gave him several strange figurines. All the while, he took photos, video, and film of these encounters, evidence of which has been confiscated and hidden away from public view.
teaser: Richard Doty reveals the most fascinating extraterrestrial contact case of his entire career. His work with the Air Force’s Office of Special Investigations included investigating cases of alien contactees such as Raymond Powtroisky.

title: Targeted Disinformation
body: Feeding disinformation to UFO seekers was one of the duties Richard Doty was tasked with when he worked in the Air Force’s Office of Special Investigations. He talks with Emery Smith about a remarkable case that involved Paul Bennewitz who intercepted classified transmissions thinking they were of alien origin. Doty and his team worked to find out what he had and then reinforced his otherworldy convictions. But when Bennewitz came across a real UFO, the game changed. Doty discusses why disinformation gambits are necessary and who is targeted. Plus, he shares details of an extraterrestrial case that became catastrophic for the military.
teaser: Richard Doty talks about a remarkable case that involved Paul Bennewitz who intercepted classified transmissions thinking they were of alien origin.

title: Project Serpo: E.T. Exchange Program
body: In 1965, 12 humans left Earth to live on a distant planet for nearly 13 years, as part of an exchange program known as Project Serpo. This was an agreement made with the home planet of the beings found in the Roswell crash. Richard Doty fills Emery Smith in on the details of this program, officially called Project Crystal Knight. He reveals what these explorers experienced concerning climate conditions, infrastructure, food, flora & fauna, and the spiritual practices of the EBENs. To this day there are still a lot of questions, conjectures, and misinformation. Despite the discrepancies in details, Doty is certain that this extraterrestrial exchange program really happened, and he shares what he knows.
teaser: In 1965, 12 humans left Earth to live on a distant planet for nearly 13 years, as part of an exchange program known as Project Serpo. This was an agreement made with the home planet of the beings found in the Roswell crash.

title: Contact: Who is Here and Why
body: Are there only five ET civilizations in contact with Earth, or countless? Richard Doty, along with Emery Smith, names and describes the features of five different extraterrestrial beings that the U.S. government officially recognizes. Some are eerily familiar; others are vastly strange to our sensibilities. Each of them has their own agenda for being here and interacting with the governments on our planet. Doty also discusses the rampant confusion and misinformation which come from various sources including abductees and military agents.
teaser: Richard Doty, along with Emery Smith, names and describes the features of five different extraterrestrial beings that the U.S. government officially recognizes.

title: Connections to Another World
body: With years of experience building secret energy tech for the U.S. government, David Adair has come to be known as "the rocket man." But little known is his brother who had two decades of face-to-face contact with a little known extraterrestrial species. David relays information his brother conveyed to him concerning the location of their home world, what they looked like, what sort of technology & transportation they used, and why they found humanity so interesting.
teaser: With years of experience building secret energy tech for the U.S. government, David Adair has come to be known as "the rocket man." But little known is his brother who had two decades of face-to-face contact with a little known extraterrestrial species.

title: Secrets of the Hollow Moon
body: Inside information concerning our moon is revealed by David Adair, who worked to develop technology for secret programs. He explains that the moon is not what many of us have been led to believe. It is a hollow vessel that was transported to our planet eons ago. The denizens of this not-so-natural satellite have not been pleased with humanity's forays to the lunar surface. David reveals inside information concerning the moon as an artificial body brought here by an ancient E.T. civilization and why it is important that they do not take our moon away.
teaser: Inside information concerning our moon is revealed by David Adair, who worked to develop technology for secret programs. He explains that the moon is not what many of us have been led to believe.

title: Interstellar Travel
body: How do aliens traverse the vast distances of interstellar space without violating Einsteinian physics? According to David Adair, they don’t. Rather they make use of an unknown loophole that theoretical physicists are just now discovering. As part of this discussion of interstellar travel, we explore various methods for powering space craft. David shares what he knows from his own work and speculates on what advanced civilizations may be using to power their spaceships.
teaser: How do aliens traverse the vast distances of interstellar space without violating Einsteinian physics? According to David Adair, they don’t. Rather they make use of an unknown loophole that theoretical physicists are just now discovering.

title: A.I. Friend or Faux?
body: David Adair explores the possibilities of a day when artificial intelligence becomes self-aware and conscious. Could this be a time when computers are granted human civil rights? If so, would this future be a place of positive growth for humanity? As he expresses his perspectives and concerns if A.I would be friend or foe, we are invited to explore our own opinions on the matter.
teaser: David Adair explores the possibilities of a day when artificial intelligence becomes self-aware and conscious. Could this be a time when computers are granted human civil rights?

title: Advanced Technology Update
body: Randy Cramer reveals more details about the advanced technology used as a super solider in the secret space program, Earth Defense Force. This includes weaponry that uses smart bullets which a target cannot evade and directed energy weapons that can fire through walls. He also describes the updated technology in battle suits and cloaked vehicles. Most of these things have been in place for decades. With the advent the overt Space Force, some of this technology will finally make it to public awareness.
teaser: Randy Cramer reveals more details about the advanced technology used as a super solider in the secret space program, Mars Defense Force.

title: Galactic Threats
body: The galaxy has mercenaries, pirates, and crime syndicates, like on Earth, controlling certain regions of space that are hazardous to travel through. These bad actors represent only 5% of the galaxy's populations. Randy Cramer tells us that 95% of the civilizations throughout our galaxy pose no threat to our planet and our way of life. But he iterates that we must stand on guard for that remaining 5% who use their advanced tech to cripple species, drive slave labor, and drain planets of their resources. He discusses various species and their agendas that lead to conflicts with members of Earth’s secret space programs.
teaser: Randy Cramer tells us that 95% of the civilizations throughout our galaxy pose no threat to our planet and our way of life. But he iterates that we must stand on guard for that remaining 5%.

title: Avatar Tech
body: Imagine being able to traverse alien worlds with hostile denizens and harsh environments, yet encounter no threat posed to you or your wellbeing. Randy Cramer discusses avatar technology that transmits the consciousness of an operator into a synthetically created body, ideally suited to thrive on such worlds. More that human exploration of other worlds, Randy reveals that extraterrestrial beings have used this tech to walk among us, undetected, for centuries.
teaser: Randy Cramer discusses avatar technology that transmits the consciousness of an operator into a synthetically created body, ideally suited to thrive on hostile worlds.

title: The Agarthan Network
body: Across the vast subterranean sphere of our planet lay a network of caverns and tunnels that serve as staging grounds for many advanced species visiting and living deep within the Earth’s crust. This is the Agarthan network, as described by Randy Cramer, who tells of the beings who reside here and operate space ports that remain hidden from the undiscerning eye. He explains that there is a collective governing body which has been an active part of our planet, long before surface-dwelling human civilizations arose. We hear tales of these subterranean people in indigenous lore throughout the Earth
teaser: Across the vast subterranean sphere of our planet lay a network of caverns and tunnels that serve as staging grounds for many advanced species visiting and living deep within the Earth’s crust. This is the Agarthan network, as described by Randy Cramer.

title: Eben Pilots of Roswell
body: The UFO crash in Roswell, NM is commonly known throughout the world. Some people even know there were two ships that crashed that night. What many of us do not know, is what happened after the two craft and the Eben pilots were recovered. Richard Doty discusses new information from documents and personnel that were involved with the vehicles recovered that fateful night. Many scientists delved into the exotic materials and strange physics, but to this day we are still unraveling mysteries about this technology.
teaser: The UFO crash in Roswell, NM is commonly known throughout the world. Few really know what happened. Richard Doty discusses new information from documents and personnel that were involved with the vehicles recovered that fateful night.

title: Secret E.T. Base Discovered!
body: A chance encounter revealed a UFO base hidden within Urania Peak on the grounds of Tonopah Air Force base, one of the most secure facilities on the planet. When Richard Doty got word of this clandestine infiltration, he assembled an armed security team to escort him as he investigated. The report he filed from his investigation was received and reviewed by top military brass who “took care of it” in a drastic way. Repercussions of this action are still classified to this day.
teaser: When Richard Doty got word of clandestine E.T. infiltration on Tonopah Air Force Base, he assembled an armed security team to escort him as he investigated.

title: Hybrid Infiltration
body: Are extraterrestrial hybrids living amongst us? This is the astounding revelation from Richard Doty who investigated strange cases of alien abduction and experimentation on human hosts. Based on these discoveries, the U.S. government implemented testing protocols to ensure that hybrids had not infiltrated sensitive military positions. He reveals that the Vatican also has testing protocols. It seems that E.T.s, of various origins, have been genetically mingling with the human populace, so that they may walk among us undetected. But to what end?
teaser: Are extraterrestrial hybrids living amongst us? This is the astounding revelation from Richard Doty who investigated strange cases of alien abduction and experimentation on human hosts.

title: Redacted E.T. Tech Revealed
body: As part of his duties with the Air Force Office of Special Investigations, Richard Doty reviewed reports and documentation concerning off-world technology. Most of which was recovered from UFO-crash sites like Roswell and Kingman. He describes some of the challenges faced with reverse engineering E.T. tech ranging from unknown substances to mysterious energy sources. Things got complicated as scientists had to sort out technology from different civilizations. The result of some of this research is in the public sector today.
teaser: As part of his duties with the Air Force Office of Special Investigations, Richard Doty reviewed reports and documentation concerning off-world technology. Most of which was recovered from UFO-crash sites like Roswell and Kingman.

title: The Aviary
body: In 1980, a group of people were brought together to form a clandestine close-knit group called The Aviary to discuss what the government knows about UFOs and E.T. contact. Richard Doty was a part of this group, and he reveals what they discussed and names the names of the who’s who from government and military agencies that made up this secret council. For five years they met, and we get an inside glimpse into what they discussed, the materials they reviewed, and what became of it all.
teaser: In 1980, a group of people were brought together to form a clandestine close-knit group called The Aviary to discuss what the government knows about UFOs and E.T. contact.

title: Interdimensional Portals for Contact
body: Interdimensional gates enable access points for extraterrestrial civilizations to contact the people of our planet. These gates can be used to initiate physical face-to-face contact, others create non-physical communication like telepathy and dreaming. Ricardo González relays information given to him by the Apunians, beings from Alpha Centauri, concerning the dimensional portals used by many E.Ts. From shamanic practices to artificial vortexes in pyramids, the gateways to our planet are numerous.
teaser: Interdimensional gates enable access points for extraterrestrial civilizations to contact the people of our planet. These gates can be used to initiate physical face-to-face contact, others create non-physical communication like telepathy and dreaming.

title: Alien Agendas
body: Why is Earth so important to every extraterrestrial civilization who visits us? Some beings see Earth as a world school or a planetary laboratory, others are here to work with military high command and senior scientists.  Ricardo González, who has contact with beings from Alpha Centauri called the Apunians, describes various reasons alien civilizations interact with our planet. The benevolent alien agenda considers human development to be of primary importance, Thus, a quarantine was issued around Earth to prevent us from leaving the solar system and dangerous species from having too much control over the direction of our destiny.
teaser: Why is Earth so important to every extraterrestrial civilization who visits us? Some beings see Earth as a world school or a planetary laboratory, others are here to work with military high command and senior scientists.

title: E.T. Communication & Contact
body: The Apunians, E.T.s from Alpha Centauri, have had many years of direct face-to-face contact with Ricardo Gonzalez. This was not the only form of contact he and others have had with such otherworldly visitors. He describes many ways that various civilizations can reach out to Earth including telepathy, dreams, astral travel, and interdimensional portals. He addresses the difference between telepathy and channeling, and how these forms of contact can affect the human host. Plus, we take a look at close encounters of the 3rd, 4th, and 5th kinds.
teaser: Ricardo Gonzalez describes many ways that various civilizations can reach out to Earth including telepathy, dreams, astral travel, and interdimensional portals. Plus, we take a look at close encounters of the 3rd, 4th, and 5th kinds.

title: Nephilim at Mt. Hermon
body: Thousands of years ago, a mission was sent to Earth in which human-looking beings were to act as guardians or watchers, simply observing early civilizations. But something went wrong. Some of these beings mingled with the human population, unintentionally creating a race of giant, six-fingered beings we call the Nephilim. Ricardo Gonzalez describes the events that took place at Mount Hermon, one of two massive time portals on Earth, where these beings landed and gave rise to historic events that have shaped human history including the ascension of Jesus as the establishment of a secret shamanic order that has persisted through the ages.
teaser: Ricardo Gonzalez describes the events that took place at Mount Hermon, one of two massive time portals on Earth, where these beings landed and gave rise to historic events that have shaped human history.

title: The Real Men in Black
body: Men in Black are real and Richard Doty has firsthand experience with them. He shares some of the their controversial tales, explaining how these stories have been distorted since the organization’s origin in the 1950s. As we explore who the Men in Black are, he discusses their official designation, their overall mission, and the tactics used to investigate and retrieve evidence of UFOs and extraterrestrial contact.
teaser: Men in Black are real and Richard Doty has firsthand experience with them. He shares some of the their controversial tales, explaining how these stories have been distorted since the organization’s origin in the 1950s.

title: Institute for Advanced Studies
body: The Institute for Advanced Studies, founded in 1985 by Dr. Hal Puthoff, was created to explore cutting-edge technology and scientific advancements -- some of which has extraterrestrial origin. Richard Doty shares some of the projects that involved organizations such as the CIA, DIA, and DARPA to reverse-engineer extraterrestrial technology for military and government use. Some of this tech has finally made it into the civilian sector and more is on the way.
teaser: The Institute for Advanced Studies was created by Dr. Hal Puthoff to explore cutting-edge advancements. Richard Doty shares the projects involving organizations like the CIA, DIA, and DARPA to reverse-engineer extraterrestrial technology.

title: Area 20
body: Area 51 has reached the common vernacular but there is another large facility containing craft of extraterrestrial origin known as Area 20. Located in the Northwest corner of the Nevada test site, the secrets it holds are just as profound as the Groom Lake facility. Richard Doty describes his hands-on access to a huge flying saucer that had been captured by the U.S. government. On another field investigation, he describes an operative who worked the Roswell crash site who kept a piece of the debris.
teaser: Area 51 has reached the common vernacular but there is another large facility containing craft of extraterrestrial origin known as Area 20. Richard Doty describes his hands-on access to a huge flying saucer that had been captured by the U.S. government.

title: Remote Viewing Mars & Beyond
body: Missions to Mars have returned images of anomalous objects that defy explanation, others have been obscured from public viewing. What are they trying to hide? This is what the Institute for Advanced Studies tried to determine through Remote Viewing sessions. Richard Doty witnessed some of these sessions and conveys information he obtained that suggest the presence of ancient civilizations on Mars. Beyond the red planet, IAS viewers also explored life within the oceans of Europa and a large craft in the vicinity of Neptune.
teaser: Richard Doty witnessed some of the Mission to Mars sessions and conveys information that suggest the presence of ancient civilizations on Mars. IAS viewers also explored life within the oceans of Europa and a large craft in the vicinity of Neptune.

title: Intergalactic Organization Revealed
body: From ancient times to modern secret space programs, advanced extraterrestrial technology has always been on our planet. Jason Shurka reveals what he has learned from a clandestine organization known as The Light System that has intergalactic connections. teaser: Retired AFOSI agent Richard Doty reveals Operation Chrome Dome’s ET encounter aboard a B-52 bomber in 1969.

title: Grey Technology Exchange Program
body:
Did an ET encounter in the South Indian Ocean reveal a Grey extraterrestrial technology exchange program?
 
On November 10, 1981, a remarkable event unfolded at Kerguelen Island, a remote and isolated location in the South Indian Ocean. It all began when the American/Australian joint defense facility known as Pine Gap detected an astonishing 30-50 UFOs on radar, soaring north from Antarctica. This anomalous sighting set off an intriguing chain of events. 

Retired AFOSI agent Richard Doty reveals the intricate and internationally-coordinated response by air and sea that followed this UFO encounter. This astonishing incident led to a clandestine meeting between scientists, military personnel, and two extraterrestrial beings known as the Greys. The outstandingly mysterious question arising from this meeting is whether the ET encounter on Kerguelen Island was connected to the enigmatic reappearance of a submarine that had been missing for years. Could both events be interconnected, part of a covert exchange program with the Greys? Uncover the untold story behind this extraordinary encounter and its possible implications.
teaser: Did an ET encounter in the South Indian Ocean reveal a Grey tech exchange program?

title: Media Controls UAP Narratives
body:
Why is the mainstream media putting the spotlight on the possibility of extraterrestrial life, and what's brewing behind the scenes to prepare for these unidentified, perplexing "guests"?
 
Tim, Tactical Advisor, joins Emery Smith to propose a thought-provoking strategy. He suggests that news outlets report coordinated coverage of Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP), tailoring it to specific regions and demographics. This approach serves a dual purpose: it normalizes UAP sightings, such as the intriguing "Tic Tac" encounters recorded by the US Navy, all while silently gauging the public's response to potential extraterrestrial encounters.
 
Intriguingly, Tim also shares classified insights into possible divergent timelines that have governed Earth's defense and trade operations since the 1950s. He argues that conventional government forces, covert agencies, and global business operations are covertly converging. Their intentions remain shrouded in secrecy, even as the mainstream media tantalizes the public with the prospect of a profound revelation. 

Are we, as a society, being meticulously prepared for the impending acknowledgment of contact with extraterrestrial life?
teaser: Is society being meticulously prepared for impending acknowledgment of ET contact?

title: ET Intervention for Upcoming Pole Shift
body:
Can changes to the Earth’s magnetic poles as well as the coronal mass ejections from our sun be positively influenced by ET intelligence and humanity’s collective consciousness?
 
Tim, the Tactical Advisor from Germany, delves into a fascinating conversation with Emery Smith about this current and extraordinary time in our planetary cycle. If the Earth's magnetic poles undergo transformations, the core and crust will alter their speed and direction, potentially leading to unprecedented cataclysmic natural events not seen since prediluvian times. Yet, this shift also presents an intriguing opportunity for the collective consciousness, including Gaia's interconnected community, to implement the Maharishi Effect through focused meditation and influence a positive outcome.
 
Tim offers insights into external forces, contemplating the role of ET intelligences on the various timelines intertwined with the impending pole shift. Could the intervention of diverse extraterrestrial species offer humanity a glimmer of hope in these uncertain times?
teaser: Can changes to Earth’s magnetic poles be positively influenced by ET intelligence?

title: Manipulating Timelines: Souls, ETs & Stability
body:
Are incarnated souls the ultimate architects of our reality, or do extraterrestrial forces also exert a significant influence over the fate of our timeline?
 
Tim, tactical advisor in the covert governance in Germany related to extraterrestrial life, delves deep into this enigma, unraveling the complex dance between incarnated souls and extraterrestrial intelligences. These powerful entities, he reveals, are acutely aware of time as a dimension and are adept at manipulating it to maintain the delicate balance of our world’s stability. Tim explores how these beings utilize their advanced awareness to either safeguard our timeline or subtly alter its course, all while the universe itself, sentient and attuned, might be playing its own part in this cosmic ballet. Embark on a journey to grasp the true nature of our reality and the unseen players shaping it.
teaser: Do incarnated souls architect reality, or do ET forces also exert timeline influence?

title: Grey & Human UFO Collaboration
body:
Are there multiple UFOs located in secret facilities on planet Earth, in a collaboration between Greys and humans?

Tim, tactical advisor in the covert governance in Germany related to extraterrestrial life, recounts his first-hand experiences with three different spacecraft. These incredible encounters offer unique insights into the astonishing construction materials and operational mechanics. Tim recounts direct telepathic communication with an extraterrestrial humanoid repairing a Grey craft. Was Tim’s tour of UFOs alongside military scientists part of a Galactic Federation initiative for humanity’s collaboration with off-world “relatives” who keep a close eye on Earth?
teaser: Are there UFOs in secret facilities, in collaboration between Greys and humans?

title: Humanity’s Origins & the Earth Experiment
body:
Could the fabled Atlantis be more than myth, perhaps a distant memory of extraterrestrial experimental colonies on Earth?

Tim, a tactical advisor in the secretive echelons of Germany's covert governance, unveils revelations from classified intelligence documents. These documents suggest our origins may trace back to an aquatic humanoid species from beyond our solar system. Tim posits that these multidimensional beings could have intricately intertwined their DNA with ours, a notion supported by our inherent aquatic affinity from birth. Could these ancient strands of DNA, embedded within our very being, be the key to unraveling age-old myths like Atlantis, offering a glimpse into a cosmic chapter of our evolutionary story?
teaser: Could the fabled Atlantis be a distant memory of ET experimental colonies on Earth?

title: Ex-Marine Whistleblower Steps Forward
body:
Hear first-hand experiences from an ex-Marine whistleblower in military service during the 2000’s about shifts in a black team operating under a covert government agenda.
 
In the first of a series of conversations with Emery Smith, Mike Herrera, a retired front-line Marine who served in infantry, discloses new layers of hidden human and ET interaction he witnessed in 2009 when captured at gunpoint. Herrera exposes incredible details of a black team operating in Indonesia, where he was stationed for humanitarian aid. He describes a hostile encounter involving the protection of highly sophisticated spacecraft with reverse-engineered advanced technology, holographic disguises, and frequency-based weaponry. 
 
Herrera is a conduit of information for above top-secret sources who have asked him to step forward to bravely reveal the truth exclusively on Gaia about the black team’s underground activities, facilities, and existence — regardless of his personal risk in doing so.
teaser: Hear experiences from an ex-Marine whistleblower in service during the 2000’s.

title: Psionic Asset Program
body:
Ex-Marine and courageous whistleblower Mike Herrera joins Emery Smith to disclose details on the mysterious black team’s use of individuals known as P-3 assets. According to Herrera, the black team’s agenda for P-3s includes extracting genetic material for potential use in cloning or hybridization, chipping for asset tracking, as well as asset manipulation through drugs and neural technologies. Herrera proposes P-3s may also be used as extraterrestrial bait, for false abductions to create fear-inducing scenarios, and to reverse-engineer advanced technology for the manufacture of weapons systems.

Is there potential collaboration between the black team and ETs, and if so, what is the motivation and end goal?
teaser: Is there potential collaboration between the black team and ETs?

title: Project Cassiopeia: Exchange Program
body:
Are there other humanoid species in the universe that share ancestry with our human race on Earth?

Tim, tactical advisor, shares an inside account of activities on Earth by advanced beings from the Cassiopeia Constellation. He highlights the similarities and differences between social structures and governmental systems as well as the details of an ongoing exchange program between Earth and Cassiopean worlds. Has the US military explored other humanoid planets in remote star systems since the 1980’s, and if so, what are their plans to integrate those off-world learnings on our planet through quantum mirroring?
teaser: Are there other species in the universe that share ancestry with humans on Earth?

title: Dimensions of Dominance & Multiple Realities
body:
What is interdimensional tugging, and why are some incarnated souls drawn in by dominant timelines?

Tactical advisor Tim, together with host Emery Smith, takes a penetrating look inside time and motion as observed by human souls, ETs, and the universe. In this fascinating discussion, we learn the mechanics and purpose of multiple versions, or timelines, of possible realities available to humans with incarnated souls. Tim also examines potential reasons these souls are either tugged to a dominant timeline or may attract and create their own reality field. What has Tim learned from Being 6 about the probable outcome of integrating parallel versions of ourselves?
teaser: Why are some incarnated souls drawn in by dominant timelines?

title: Greys Introduce Frog Race to Humanity
body:
Is there a one million-year-old frog race that was introduced to humanity by the Greys?

Host Emery Smith questions Tactical Advisor, Tim, about the nature of his direct knowledge of Trogdaborians, an ancient creator species responsible for seeding Earth with genetic material. Through Tim’s communication with the Greys in his covert role within German governance, he was introduced to information about this benevolent ET race resembling bipedal tree frogs, which may originate from a planet in a Red Star system. Is it possible the Trogdaborians travel the universe on a mobile homeworld with its own energy source? If so, what relationship exists between the Greys, humanity, and the Trogdaborians?
teaser: Is there a one million-year-old frog race introduced to humanity by the Greys?

title: Saturn & the Council of 7
body:
Can planets hold sentience, and is there tangible evidence of Saturn’s structural manifestations on Earth in the form of events and timelines? 

Tim, Tactical Advisor, discloses to Emery Smith the link between what humanity calls Christ consciousness and the first life form in this solar system to reach the highest level of frequential harmony, Level 7. Tim believes the maintenance of the Council of 7 is conducted by the Galactic Federation, and Saturn is the meeting point for communications to an Andromedan species on Earth with covert military contacts.

Is every mainstream human group who uses an arrow in their logo communicating with the Council of 7, a group of ET beings based around Saturn, with God-level consciousness?
teaser: Is there tangible evidence of Saturn’s structural manifestations on Earth?
